verses.verse: הַחֲרִ֤ישׁוּ <S%H2790><s%> Keep silence אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אִיִּ֔ים <S%H339><s%> before me O islands וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> and let the people יַחֲלִ֣יפוּ <S%H2498><s%> renew כֹ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> [their] strength יִגְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> let them come near אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> then יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> then let them speak יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> to judgment נִקְרָֽבָה׃ <S%H7126><s%> let us come near

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who הֵעִיר֙ <S%H5782><s%> Who raised up מִמִּזְרָ֔ח <S%H4217><s%> [man] from the east צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> the righteous יִקְרָאֵ֣הוּ <S%H7121><s%> called לְרַגְל֑וֹ <S%H7272><s%> him to his foot יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לְפָנָ֤יו <S%H6440><s%> before גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> the nations וּמְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> kings יַ֔רְדְּ <S%H7287><s%> him and made [him] rule יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> makes כֶּֽעָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> [them] as the dust חַרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H2719><s%> to his sword כְּקַ֥שׁ <S%H7179><s%> stubble נִדָּ֖ף <S%H5086><s%> [and] as driven קַשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7198><s%> to his bow

יִרְדְּפֵ֖ם <S%H7291><s%> He pursued יַעֲב֣וֹר <S%H5674><s%> them [and] passed שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> safely אֹ֥רַח <S%H734><s%> [even] by the way בְּרַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> with his feet לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> had not יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> [that] he had not gone

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who פָעַ֣ל <S%H6466><s%> Who hath wrought וְעָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and done קֹרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> [it] calling הַדֹּר֖וֹת <S%H1755><s%> the generations מֵרֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> band אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah רִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרֹנִ֖ים <S%H314><s%> and with the last אֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

רָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw אִיִּים֙ <S%H339><s%> The isles וְיִירָ֔אוּ <S%H3372><s%> [it] and feared קְצ֥וֹת <S%H7098><s%> the ends הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יֶחֱרָ֑דוּ <S%H2729><s%> were afraid קָרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> drew near וַיֶּאֱתָיֽוּן׃ <S%H857><s%> and came

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour יַעְזֹ֑רוּ <S%H5826><s%> They helped וּלְאָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> to his brother יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> and [every one] said חֲזָֽק׃ <S%H2388><s%> Be of good courage

וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> encouraged חָרָשׁ֙ <S%H2796><s%> So the carpenter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹרֵ֔ף <S%H6884><s%> the goldsmith מַחֲלִ֥יק <S%H2505><s%> [and] he that smootheth פַּטִּ֖ישׁ <S%H6360><s%> [with] the hammer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ה֣וֹלֶם <S%H1986><s%> him that smote פָּ֑עַם <S%H6471><s%> the anvil אֹמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> saying לַדֶּ֙בֶק֙ <S%H1694><s%> for the sodering ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> It [is] ready ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וַיְחַזְּקֵ֥הוּ <S%H2388><s%> and he fastened בְמַסְמְרִ֖ים <S%H4548><s%> it with nails לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> [that] it should not be moved ס

וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> But thou Israel עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> [art] my servant יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom בְּחַרְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H977><s%> whom I have chosen זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> the seed אַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֹהֲבִֽי׃ <S%H157><s%> my friend

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶחֱזַקְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H2388><s%> [Thou] whom I have taken מִקְצ֣וֹת <S%H7098><s%> from the ends הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וּמֵאֲצִילֶ֖יהָ <S%H678><s%> thee from the chief men קְרָאתִ֑יךָ <S%H7121><s%> and called וָאֹ֤מַר <S%H559><s%> thereof and said לְךָ֙ עַבְדִּי־ <S%H5650><s%> unto thee Thou [art] my servant אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> I בְּחַרְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H977><s%> I have chosen וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not מְאַסְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H3988><s%> thee and not cast thee away

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עִמְּךָ־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁתָּ֖ע <S%H8159><s%> thou not for I [am] with thee be not dismayed כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> for I [am] thy God אִמַּצְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H553><s%> I will strengthen אַף־ <S%H637><s%> surely עֲזַרְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H5826><s%> thee yea I will help אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Surely תְּמַכְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H8551><s%> thee yea I will uphold בִּימִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> thee with the right hand צִדְקִֽי׃ <S%H6664><s%> of my righteousness

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יֵבֹ֙שׁוּ֙ <S%H954><s%> against thee shall be ashamed וְיִכָּ֣לְמ֔וּ <S%H3637><s%> and confounded כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַנֶּחֱרִ֣ים <S%H2734><s%> Behold all they that were incensed בָּ֑ךְ יִֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> will be as כְאַ֛יִן <S%H369><s%> nothing וְיֹאבְד֖וּ <S%H6><s%> with thee shall perish אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> Those רִיבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7379><s%> that strive

תְּבַקְשֵׁם֙ <S%H1245><s%> Thou shalt seek וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> but will not תִמְצָאֵ֔ם <S%H4672><s%> them and shalt not find אַנְשֵׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> those מַצֻּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4695><s%> that contended יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> will be as כְאַ֛יִן <S%H369><s%> nothing וּכְאֶ֖פֶס <S%H657><s%> against thee shall be as nothing and as a thing of nought אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> who מִלְחַמְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4421><s%> with thee they that war

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> will hold יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand הָאֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְךָ֛ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> unto thee Fear אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I עֲזַרְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5826><s%> not I will help ס

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְאִי֙ <S%H3372><s%> Fear תּוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> not thou worm יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob מְתֵ֖י <S%H4962><s%> [and] ye men יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I עֲזַרְתִּיךְ֙ <S%H5826><s%> I will help נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> thee saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1350><s%> and thy redeemer קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שַׂמְתִּ֗יךְ <S%H7760><s%> Behold I will make לְמוֹרַג֙ <S%H4173><s%> threshing חָר֣וּץ <S%H2742><s%> sharp חָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> thee a new בַּ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> instrument having פִּֽיפִיּ֑וֹת <S%H6374><s%> teeth תָּד֤וּשׁ <S%H1758><s%> thou shalt thresh הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וְתָדֹ֔ק <S%H1854><s%> and beat [them] small וּגְבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> the hills כַּמֹּ֥ץ <S%H4671><s%> as chaff תָּשִֽׂים׃ <S%H7760><s%> and shalt make

תִּזְרֵם֙ <S%H2219><s%> Thou shalt fan וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> them and the wind תִּשָּׂאֵ֔ם <S%H5375><s%> shall carry them away וּסְעָרָ֖ה <S%H5591><s%> and the whirlwind תָּפִ֣יץ <S%H6327><s%> shall scatter אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you תָּגִ֣יל <S%H1523><s%> them and thou shalt rejoice בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD בִּקְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> in the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תִּתְהַלָּֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> [and] shalt glory פ

הָעֲנִיִּ֨ים <S%H6041><s%> [When] the poor וְהָאֶבְיוֹנִ֜ים <S%H34><s%> and needy מְבַקְשִׁ֥ים <S%H1245><s%> seek מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> water וָאַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> there לְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <S%H3956><s%> and [there is] none [and] their tongue בַּצָּמָ֣א <S%H6772><s%> for thirst נָשָׁ֑תָּה <S%H5405><s%> faileth אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD אֶעֱנֵ֔ם <S%H6030><s%> will hear אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> them I the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶעֶזְבֵֽם׃ <S%H5800><s%> will not forsake

אֶפְתַּ֤ח <S%H6605><s%> I will open עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁפָיִים֙ <S%H8205><s%> in high places נְהָר֔וֹת <S%H5104><s%> rivers וּבְת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בְּקָע֖וֹת <S%H1237><s%> of the valleys מַעְיָנ֑וֹת <S%H4599><s%> and fountains אָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> I will make מִדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness לַאֲגַם־ <S%H98><s%> a pool מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land צִיָּ֖ה <S%H6723><s%> and the dry לְמוֹצָ֥אֵי <S%H4161><s%> springs מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of water

אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> I will plant בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אֶ֣רֶז <S%H730><s%> the cedar שִׁטָּ֔ה <S%H7848><s%> the shittah tree וַהֲדַ֖ס <S%H1918><s%> and the myrtle וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree שָׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and the oil אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> I will set בָּעֲרָבָ֗ה <S%H6160><s%> in the desert בְּר֛וֹשׁ <S%H1265><s%> the fir tree תִּדְהָ֥ר <S%H8410><s%> [and] the pine וּתְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H8391><s%> and the box tree יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> That they may see וְיֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> and know וְיָשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and consider וְיַשְׂכִּ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H7919><s%> and understand יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> That יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> that the hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עָ֣שְׂתָה <S%H6213><s%> hath done זֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וּקְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> this and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּרָאָֽהּ׃ <S%H1254><s%> hath created פ

קָרְב֥וּ <S%H7126><s%> Produce רִֽיבְכֶ֖ם <S%H7379><s%> your cause יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַגִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> bring forth עֲצֻמ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6110><s%> your strong יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> [reasons] saith מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the King יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

יַגִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <S%H5066><s%> Let them bring [them] forth וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and shew לָ֔נוּ אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what תִּקְרֶ֑ינָה <S%H7136><s%> us what shall happen הָרִאשֹׁנ֣וֹת ׀ <S%H7223><s%> the former things מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what הֵ֗נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in הַגִּ֜ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> let them shew וְנָשִׂ֤ימָה <S%H7760><s%> may consider לִבֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3820><s%> care for וְנֵדְעָ֣ה <S%H3045><s%> them and know אַחֲרִיתָ֔ן <S%H319><s%> the latter end א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or הַבָּא֖וֹת <S%H935><s%> us things for to come הַשְׁמִיעֻֽנוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> of them or declare
